entry.title: $2335 // Bushwick's First True Luxury Building- Over 40 Ammenities
entry.content:
Welcome to the The Rheingold. Bushwick's finest true luxury building!
All the units were designed to fully utilize living space and have the latest in comfort, design and technology. Huge windows and open floor plans allow for sunlit and cheerful layouts. Apartments are equipped with efficient cooling/heating systems, built-in Bluetooth speakers and video intercom.

Inside every apartment you'll find wide-plank white oak flooring, designer tiles, high ceilings and good closet space, the varying floor plans means there are options for all. Most feature private outdoor spaces. Kitchens feature stainless steel appliances, soft-close glass cabinetry and sparkling porcelain backsplashes. The bathrooms are outfitted with deep-soaking tubs, sleek chrome fittings, beautiful tiles and medicine cabinets.

You may never have to leave the building with over 70,000 sqft of outdoor spaces, 41 unique amenities, and a concierge service to handle all your needs,Now offering 1 full year FREE Platinum Amenities Package!
Amenities include;
* Multiple Lobbies
* Gym
* Laundry Room
* Climbing Wall
* Bike Parking
* Cafeteria
* Sauna - Dry/Wet
* Business Center
* Squash Court
* Yoga Room
* Open Art Zone
* Game Room
* Kids Room
* Art Gallery
* Roof
* Courtyards 1, 2, 3
* Dog Run
* Concierge Events

Bushwick is quickly becoming on of Brooklyn's hottest and hippest neighborhoods with all the charm and convenance NYC has to offer, right at your fingertips. Home one of the most unrivaled arts, theater and music scenes, located in former industrial warehouses.

NET RENT SHOWN

entry.title: $2475 // *Williamsburg* Beautiful 1BR, Expsd Brick, JMZ & L lines, No Fee!
entry.content:
Beautiful 1 BR in Williamsburg on S 3rd Street,
-Sunshine beaming off the shiny hardwood floors throughout
-Exposed brick adds rustic charm
-High ceilings
-Lots of closet space
-Central A/C
-Washer&Dryer Allowed
-Close to the J/M/Z and L trains for quick rides to Bushwick and Manhattan
-Close to shops, restaurants, laundromats
-Pets welcome!
-No Broker Fee!!
